subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks trailed by 21 in the third quarter when Coach Derek Fisher replaced his entire starting five, but the Knicks could not drop the Bucks’ lead below 9 points.
snippet: The Knicks trailed by 21 in the third quarter when Coach Derek Fisher replaced his entire starting five, but the Knicks could not drop the Bucks’ lead below 9 points.
